Title: Raise the Red Lantern
Writer: Su Tong (original novel "Wives and Concubines" by), Ni Zhen (scriptwriter)
Actors: Li Gong, Saifei He, Jingwu Ma, Cuifen Cao
Plot: A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 24 wins & 14 nominations.
Production: Salon Films, China Film Co-Production Corporation, ERA International, Century Communications
